type.name: org.gradle.api.publish.ivy.IvyModuleDescriptorSpec
type.description:
The descriptor of any Ivy publication.

Corresponds to the XML version of the Ivy Module Descriptor.

The #withXml(org.gradle.api.Action) method can be used to modify the descriptor after it has been generated according to the publication data. @since 1.3
